\doxysubsection{Function Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__struct__utils__metrics_gae08cbd5ff44b7d77a271ceb79c12cfef}\label{group__struct__utils__metrics_gae08cbd5ff44b7d77a271ceb79c12cfef}} 
\index{Distance measures between Secondary Structures@{Distance measures between Secondary Structures}!vrna\_bp\_distance\_pt@{vrna\_bp\_distance\_pt}}
\index{vrna\_bp\_distance\_pt@{vrna\_bp\_distance\_pt}!Distance measures between Secondary Structures@{Distance measures between Secondary Structures}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{vrna\_bp\_distance\_pt()}{vrna\_bp\_distance\_pt()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily int vrna\+\_\+bp\+\_\+distance\+\_\+pt (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const short $\ast$}]{pt1,  }\item[{const short $\ast$}]{pt2 }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



{\ttfamily \#include $<$\mbox{\hyperlink{utils_2structures_8h}{Vienna\+RNA/utils/structures.\+h}}$>$}



Compute the \char`\"{}base pair\char`\"{} distance between two pair tables pt1 and pt2 of secondary structures. 

The pair tables should have the same length. dist = number of base pairs in one structure but not in the other same as edit distance with open-\/pair close-\/pair as move-\/set

\begin{DoxySeeAlso}{See also}
\mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__metrics_ga65bdfbac6a16bf30286e8a3f7d15f60a}{vrna\+\_\+bp\+\_\+distance()}}
\end{DoxySeeAlso}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em pt1} & First structure in dot-\/bracket notation \\
\hline
{\em pt2} & Second structure in dot-\/bracket notation \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The base pair distance between pt1 and pt2
\end{DoxyReturn}
\begin{DoxyRefDesc}{SWIG Wrapper Notes}
\item[\mbox{\hyperlink{wrappers__wrappers000142}{SWIG Wrapper Notes}}]This function is available as an overloaded method {\bfseries{\mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__deprecated_ga6ebbcd29a754f0e4f1a66d1fd84184db}{bp\+\_\+distance()}}}}. \end{DoxyRefDesc}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__struct__utils__metrics_ga65bdfbac6a16bf30286e8a3f7d15f60a}\label{group__struct__utils__metrics_ga65bdfbac6a16bf30286e8a3f7d15f60a}} 
\index{Distance measures between Secondary Structures@{Distance measures between Secondary Structures}!vrna\_bp\_distance@{vrna\_bp\_distance}}
\index{vrna\_bp\_distance@{vrna\_bp\_distance}!Distance measures between Secondary Structures@{Distance measures between Secondary Structures}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{vrna\_bp\_distance()}{vrna\_bp\_distance()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily int vrna\+\_\+bp\+\_\+distance (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const char $\ast$}]{str1,  }\item[{const char $\ast$}]{str2 }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



{\ttfamily \#include $<$\mbox{\hyperlink{utils_2structures_8h}{Vienna\+RNA/utils/structures.\+h}}$>$}



Compute the \char`\"{}base pair\char`\"{} distance between two secondary structures s1 and s2. 

This is a wrapper around {\bfseries{\mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__metrics_gae08cbd5ff44b7d77a271ceb79c12cfef}{vrna\+\_\+bp\+\_\+distance\+\_\+pt()}}}}. The sequences should have the same length. dist = number of base pairs in one structure but not in the other same as edit distance with open-\/pair close-\/pair as move-\/set

\begin{DoxySeeAlso}{See also}
\mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__metrics_gae08cbd5ff44b7d77a271ceb79c12cfef}{vrna\+\_\+bp\+\_\+distance\+\_\+pt()}}
\end{DoxySeeAlso}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em str1} & First structure in dot-\/bracket notation \\
\hline
{\em str2} & Second structure in dot-\/bracket notation \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The base pair distance between str1 and str2
\end{DoxyReturn}
\begin{DoxyRefDesc}{SWIG Wrapper Notes}
\item[\mbox{\hyperlink{wrappers__wrappers000143}{SWIG Wrapper Notes}}]This function is available as an overloaded method {\bfseries{\mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__deprecated_ga6ebbcd29a754f0e4f1a66d1fd84184db}{bp\+\_\+distance()}}}}. Note that the SWIG wrapper takes two structure in dot-\/bracket notation and converts them into pair tables using \mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__pair__table_ga2c4f27a8e277f21f0d2cc10bc9a99420}{vrna\+\_\+ptable\+\_\+from\+\_\+string()}}. The resulting pair tables are then internally passed to \mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__metrics_gae08cbd5ff44b7d77a271ceb79c12cfef}{vrna\+\_\+bp\+\_\+distance\+\_\+pt()}}. To control which kind of matching brackets will be used during conversion, the optional argument {\ttfamily options} can be used. See also the description of \mbox{\hyperlink{group__struct__utils__pair__table_ga2c4f27a8e277f21f0d2cc10bc9a99420}{vrna\+\_\+ptable\+\_\+from\+\_\+string()}} for available options. (default\+: {\bfseries{VRNA\+\_\+\+BRACKETS\+\_\+\+RND}}). \end{DoxyRefDesc}
